mdRecord.dcterms:title: President Higinio Moriﾌ］igo of Paraguay at Mount Vernon, June 12, 1943
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print; President Higinio Moriﾌ］igo of Paraguay and accompanying party stand on the steps to the entrance of the west front of the Mansion at Mount Vernon. Mount Vernon's Resident Superintendent Charles C. Wall stands behind and just over the shoulder of President Moriﾌ］igo (third from right) near the louvered door.
